name: novadb
description: Connect AI assistants to NovaDB for content management, search, and data modeling
long_description:
The NovaDB MCP Server connects AI assistants to NovaDB's CMS and Index APIs, providing 67 tools for comprehensive content management.

## Core Capabilities

**Object Management** — Create, read, update, and delete CMS objects with full support for typed attributes, language-dependent values, and multi-value references.

**Schema & Type System** — Define and manage object types with inline attribute creation, automatic form generation, and support for all NovaDB data types (String, Integer, Decimal, Boolean, DateTime, ObjRef, BinRef, and more).

**Attribute Definitions** — Create and configure attributes with validation rules, virtualization code (server-side computed values via JavaScript), multi-value support, and ObjRef type constraints.

**Forms** — Build and manage forms that define which attributes appear on object types. Add, remove, and reorder form fields, and link forms to types as create forms or detail tabs.

**Full-Text Search & Indexing** — Search objects and comments with full-text queries, attribute filters, sorting, and pagination. Get faceted counts, type-ahead suggestions, and reference usage analysis.

**Branching & Work Packages** — Create and manage branches for isolated content editing workflows. List, search, and inspect branches with resolved metadata.

**Comments** — Add, edit, and search XHTML comments on objects with support for user mentions and branch-scoped filtering.

**Jobs & Code Generation** — Start and monitor background jobs, retrieve logs, metrics, and artifacts. Generate C# code from object type definitions.

**File Management** — Upload and download files with chunked transfer support for large assets.

## Configuration

Requires a NovaDB instance URL and credentials for both the CMS and Index APIs.
